metadata.dc:author: Becerra Partida, Omar Fernando
metadata.dc:description: This research will address loopholes in Mexico about surrogacy and the reluctance of legislators, and therefore being forgotten by Bioethics and Biolaw.
metadata.dc:title: Análisis de la figura jurídica del arrendamiento de vientre en México, desde el punto de vista de la bioética personalista.
[Not Available].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de derecho y genoma humano = Law and the human genome review
